title: Subdomain
description: Schema for subdomain JSON files that define subdomains within a domain. Subdomains provide finer-grained organization within a domain. Subdomain files are located within a domain directory. The subdomain's key is derived from its path relative to the domain. If validation fails, verify 'name' is present and non-empty.

name.description: The display name of the subdomain (e.g., 'Payment Processing', 'Order Validation'). This is the human-readable name shown in diagrams. Must be non-empty. If validation fails: ensure this is a string with at least one character.

details.description: Optional detailed description of the subdomain. Describe the subdomain's purpose and how it relates to its parent domain. Helps readers understand the organizational hierarchy.

uml_comment.description: Optional UML comment for diagram annotations. This text appears as a note attached to the subdomain package in generated UML diagrams.
